class.name: UtilityAIMetadataSearchCriterion
class.brief_description: Filters nodes based on their metadata.
class.description: The metadata search criterion can be used to filter nodes based on their metadata. Currently only metadata with type [String] is supported. Both the [param name] and [param value] of the metadata must match, otherwise the node will be filtered out.

members.member: The name of the metadata field to find.
The value of the named metadata field.
